attributes.action: Stop giving suspended sentences to people convicted of animal abuse.
attributes.additional_details: Too many animals are being abused and dying slow painful deaths. The pathetic sentences handed out are not a deterrent, we need to send a message to these kind of people that it will not be a slap on the wrist and that they will receive substantial sentences.
attributes.background: Stop giving suspended sentences to those who abuse animals especially in cases where animals are left to die in what basically amounts to torture. A life time ban on keeping animals should also be mandatory. Offenders with children should also be subject to social services investigations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701925
